author: sboag
msg: Added Gary L Peskin's extension files.

author: costin
msg: Removed import statements for org.apache.xml.serialize, use transition
( it used to compile fine if xerces and xml.serialize was in classpath,
doesn't work if another parser is used )

author: sboag
msg: Changed how "trax.properties" is accessed.  See note on Xalan list.
Moved transformation to secondary thread, and parser to main thread.
Use "http://xml.apache.org/xslt/sourcebase" to set base URL for input source.

author: garyp
msg: Implement function-available, element-available, processElement; clean up javadoc

author: garyp
msg: Implement function-available and element-available; clean up javadoc
